snippet: Philippine troops have found the remains of a German hostage who was beheaded by Abu Sayyaf militants in the country's south, vowing Sunday to rescue more than 30 other captives and crush the ransom-seeking extremists....

headline.main: Prosecutors: NY Man Willing to Sacrifice Self for Jihad
headline.print_headline: Prosecutors: NY Man Willing to Sacrifice Self for Jihad

lead_paragraph: Philippine troops have found the remains of a German hostage who was beheaded by Abu Sayyaf militants in the country's south, vowing Sunday to rescue more than 30 other captives and crush the ransom-seeking extremists.
